productEmsList.title: Sensor Bundle
productEmsList.tooltip: Includes heart rate monitor with soft strap, speed sensor and cadence sensor

productEmsList.title: Mountain Bike Bundle
productEmsList.tooltip: Includes mountain bike mount, speed sensor, Edge remote and silicone case

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: Edge® 530 Mountain Bike Bundle includes a bike computer with mapping & performance insights as well as a silicone case & speed sensor for pedal speed data.
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: Edge, Edge Mountain Bike Bundle, Garmin Edge 530 Bundle, Edge 530 Mountain Bike Bundle
seoAttributes.seoTitle: Garmin Edge® 530 Mountain Bike Bundle | Bike Computer
seoAttributes.title: Edge® 530 Mountain Bike Bundle

seo.ogDescription: Edge® 530 cycling computer provides mapping & performance insights such as VO2 max recovery, to see how your body performs in different environments.
seo.title: Garmin Edge® 530 | Bike Computer with Performance Insights

010-02060-02.shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.content:
General
Dimension1.9" x 3.2" x 0.8" (50 x 82 x 20 mm)
Weight

2.7 oz (75.8 g)

Water rating IPX7
Display TypeTransflective TFT
Display Size2.6" (66 mm) diagonal
Display Resolution246 x 322 pixels
Colour display
Battery typerechargeable lithium-ion
Battery life

up to 20 hours

Battery save mode
In-ride power compatible (Power Mount and Garmin Charge battery pack)

Maps & Memory
Ability to add maps
Basemap
External memory storage16 GB (internal memory only)
Waypoints/favorites/locations200
Navigation Routes100 courses
Historyup to 200 hours

Sensors
GPS
GLONASS
Galileo
Barometric altimeter
Accelerometer
Ambient light sensor
Magnetometer

Daily Smart Features
ConnectivityBluetooth®, ANT+®, Wi-Fi®
Connect IQ™ (downloadable watch faces, data fields, widgets and apps)
Smart Notifications
Text response/reject phone call with text (Android™ only)
Weather forecasts
VIRB® Remote
Smart trainer control
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Safety and Tracking Features
Assistance
LiveTrack
Group LiveTrack
Rider-to-rider messaging
Incident Detection
Find My Edge®
Bike alarm
Weather alerts
inReach® compatible

Activity Tracking Features
Calories Burned

Training, Planning and Analysis Features
Customisable screen(s)
Downloadable training plans
Auto Pause®
Interval training
Advanced workouts
Auto Lap®
Vo2 Max
Training status - Cycling
Training load - Cycling
Training load focus - Cycling
training effect
Recovery advisor
Virtual Partner
Race an Activity
Segments
Auto scroll
Physio TrueUp

Outdoor Recreation
ClimbPro Ascent Planner - Cycling

Cycling Features
Courses
Alerts (triggers alarm when you reach goals including time, distance, heart rate or calories)
FTP (Functional Threshold Power)
Cycle Map (routable cycling-specific street map)
MTB Dynamics
Compatible with Varia™ radar (rear-facing radar)
Compatible with Varia Radar Camera
Compatible with Varia™ lights
Power meter compatible
On-device location search
Trendline Popularity Routing - Cycling
Popularity heatmap
Cycling Dynamics compatible
Integrated TrailForks trail data

Connectivity
Edge® remote
Varia™ remote
ANT+™ electronic shifting
Shimano Di2 Synchro Shift integration
Extended display (allows a Garmin watch to share data screens on Edge®)
